p: Correlations are also observed in the HMBC spectrum due to the proton at δ 7.04 with the carbon at δ 140.2 and 128. The proton at δ 7.34 correlates with the carbon at δ 147, 134, and 19. Therefore, compound 3 is a novel compound isolated for the first time from the roots of O. cufodontii with its structure depicted in Fig. 1.
